Quickstrike:






Quickstrike struck out at Sinesis. "Get offa me! Ah'm fine!" He slowly stood 
up, sore and just as badly hurt as before. He looked around the room. Black 
Arachnia was gone.

His eyes went into a baneful glow. "Ah'm goin' after 'er!" He picked himself 
up and limped to the door. He firmly opened the door, almost ramming it.

Wounded leg, or no wounded leg, he said to himself. I'm gonna kick her 
kiester!
